borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Erection of a front roof extension, including installation of a rooflight on top of the main flat roof, and erection of dormer French doors and a Juliette balcony to replace an existing window to the rear elevation; erection of a rear extension at second floor level, over part of the existing back addition; erection of a single storey rear extension, to the side and rear of existing back addition; excavation of the front, side and part of the rear garden to form lightwells, in connection with the creation of a new basement, and erection of external staircase from rear lightwell into the rear garden; replacement of all existing windows with new double glazed timber windows; installation of French doors and a Juliette balcony to replace an existing window to the rear elevation, and re-sizing and replacement of 2no. existing windows to the side elevation of first floor back addition; installation of a window, to the side elevation at ground floor level; installation of a window to the side elevation, and installation of a double glazed metal framed window to the rear elevation at basement level within the proposed side lightwell.
